name: specialist-card.toml

component.name: Specialist Card
component.description: Displays specialist information with avatar, services, cities and status toggle

rawContent:
[component]
id = "specialist-card"
name = "Specialist Card"
description = "Displays specialist information with avatar, services, cities and status toggle"

[component.props]
specialist = "SpecialistEntity"
onToggleActive = "(id: string, isActive: boolean) => void"
onDelete = "(id: string) => void"
onSelect = "(specialist: SpecialistEntity) => void (optional)"

[component.features]
list = [
  "Specialist avatar",
  "Name and contact info",
  "Service type badges",
  "City badges",
  "Active/inactive toggle switch",
  "Delete action",
  "Selection mode for assignment"
]

[component.styling]
hover = "shadow-md transition"
inactive = "opacity-60"
responsive = true

[component.usage]
code = """
import { SpecialistCard } from '@prototype/components'

<SpecialistCard
  specialist={specialist}
  onToggleActive={(id, active) => toggleStatus(id, active)}
  onDelete={(id) => removeSpecialist(id)}
/>
"""

[relations]
entities = ["specialist"]
routes = ["admin-specialists"]

[implementation]
component = "SpecialistCard"
file = "src/prototype/components/SpecialistCard.tsx"
status = "planned"
